about_the_game:
Wukong Survivors ： Prologue is a Vampire Survivors-like game where players take on the role of Sun Wukong, battling against endlessly spawning enemies.
Live as long as you can until you finally face certain death.

Game Features:

Wukong Survivors Is a combination of Journey to the West and meat pigeon elements of the casual game, through the choice of time and again to make the character become stronger, surrounded by monsters are fearless.
Collect resources to continuously level up.
Choose between melee or ranged skills as your core abilities.
The gameplay is simple and easy to use.

Controls: Use ASWD to move and dodge enemies.

name: Wukong Survivors ： Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7
  • Processor: i3-9320
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 Ti
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Wukong Survivors ： Prologue is a Vampire Survivors-like game where players take on the role of Sun Wukong, battling against endlessly spawning enemies.
supported_languages:
English, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Spanish - Latin America*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
